name: Number Wizard (MartinVenturini)
description:
This project was created to compile the following aspects:

  • VFX/particle system design: electricity in the mage's hands and eyes, vapor on the asteroids hovering over his hand, and multiple layers of stars in the background.
  • Shader development: scrolling "galaxy" background with emission.
  • Programming: game logic, acceleration and deceleration of asteroids, color, and intensity of mage's materials and some stars, activation of various particle systems.
  • Post-processing.
